attributes.action: make laws regarding dogs and how they are retained.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I Miss Katie Jennings feel as a mother myself that there are being too many attacks by dogs of all breds and sizes and think it is about time somthing was don. I feel that ALL dogs should be at all times kept on a lesh and higher risk dogs to be muzzled also.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
